bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with re li 熱痢 , heat free-flux illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry chai hu 柴胡 quotes Ji ji fang 濟急方 : 積熱下痢：柴胡、黃芩等分，半酒半水煎七分，浸冷，空心服 之 , “For accumulated heat free-flux illness : Boil equal amounts of chai hu and huang qi in [a liquid consisting of] one half wine and one half water down to 70%. Wait until it has cooled down and ingest on an empty stomach”.
